long_description: 2 pairs of Burton Weekender socks are perfect for those with 4 feet or anyone who prefers a fresh start to each day! Dry feet equal warm feet: Weekender socks are built with fabrics that draw heat-robbing moisture away from your skin before your feet freeze solid. Reinforced toes and heels; chafe-free toe seams. Stay-high comfort band keeps socks from slipping down. 2 pairs of socks means twice as much stretchy, breathable support, cushioning and midweight warmth. Please note: a package of 2 pairs counts as 1 pair of socks for the 10% volume discount. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: 2 pairs of Burton Weekender socks are perfect for those with 4 feet or anyone who prefers a fresh start to each day!
